hasAttributes.name: BuildingId
hasAttributes.description: Unique identifier either coming from previous system otherwise it needs to be defined

hasAttributes.name: SiteId
hasAttributes.description: Reference to the Site which the building belongs to

hasAttributes.name: Name
hasAttributes.description: Name of entity

hasAttributes.name: BuildingCode
hasAttributes.description: User specific Building Code

hasAttributes.name: PrimaryTypeOfBuilding
hasAttributes.description: Type of building use

hasAttributes.name: SecondaryTypeOfBuilding
hasAttributes.description: Second type of building use

hasAttributes.name: EnergyEfficiencyClass
hasAttributes.description: Energy Efficiency Class of Building

hasAttributes.name: ValidFrom
hasAttributes.description: The records can be used from this date onwards in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)

hasAttributes.name: ValidUntil
hasAttributes.description: The records can be used until this date in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform to ISO 8061)

hasAttributes.name: ConstructionYear
hasAttributes.description: Year of construction in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform ISO 8061). In case only year exists use yyyy-01-01T00:00:00Z

hasAttributes.name: YearOfLastRefurbishment
hasAttributes.description: Year of last refurbishment took place in yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ form (conform ISO 8061). In case only year exists use yyyy-01-01T00:00:00Z.

hasAttributes.name: MonumentProtection
hasAttributes.description: The building is declared to be an ancient monument with national importance by the government

hasAttributes.name: TypeOfOwnership
hasAttributes.description: Is the building owned or leased.

hasAttributes.name: SelfUse
hasAttributes.description: Is building self used or not (Y/N)

hasAttributes.name: TenantStructure
hasAttributes.description: Is there multiple tenants in the building or only one

hasAttributes.name: ParkingSpaces
hasAttributes.description: Number of parking spaces

hasAttributes.name: PrimaryEnergyType
hasAttributes.description: Type of energy used

hasAttributes.name: PrimaryWaterType
hasAttributes.description: Type of water used

hasAttributes.name: PrimaryHeatingType
hasAttributes.description: Primary Type of heating

hasAttributes.name: SecondaryHeatingType
hasAttributes.description: Secondary Type of heating

hasAttributes.name: AirConditioning
hasAttributes.description: Does the building have air conditioning (Y/N) (Needed for precise  future emissions projection of building)

definitions.description: A building represents a structure that provides shelter for its occupants or contents and stands in one place. The building is also used to provide a basic element within the spatial structure hierarchy for the components of a building project (together with site, storey, and space)
